TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to update and exchange Affiliations information of an Organisation in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates an Organisation with specific Affiliations. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly. Nation A updates the Affiliations of the Organisation.Nation B receives and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes message elements belonging in the Organisation message schema area. Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the updated Affiliations of the Organisation are displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates a message element for an Organisation with the following affiliations: GeopoliticalAffiliation EthnicAffiliation ReligiousAffiliation OtherAffiliation
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the Organisation with all affiliations correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates all of the 4 Affiliation Sub-Types.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the Organisation with the new affiliations correctly.
